name: Z ViRus: V.I.R.M Uprising
summary: A virus outbreak has spread across the galaxy infecting all human life. It appears to have originated from an unknown species that scientists found and kept classified. Explore various locations such as planets and ships. Fight off hoards and acquire intel scientists documented but didn't live to finish. Level up your classes to acquire additional assets for your loadout! You are the galaxy's last hope to end the virus before it reaches Earth.

name: Zvezda
summary: 3D space simulation. Fly your space fighter in intense campaign set in outer space!

name: Z-Virus
summary: You are trapped alone in the dark place with the infected. This is your chance to escape and have your revenge. This game is inspired by the Resident Evil series.Gameplay involves fighting enemies in tight corridors, solving puzzles etc.

name: Z Virus: Outbreak
summary: Z Virus: Outbreak is an interactive graphic novel. At various points in the story, you will be asked to make a choice, these choices will take you down different paths in the story. Your objective is to escape the city of Redrock during a zombie outbreak. The game features 3 possible story endings.
